histogram.name: SegmentationPlatform.AdaptiveToolbar.ModelScore.{SegmentID}
histogram.summary: Records the segmentation platform model evaluation score for the given {SegmentID}. Recorded whenever the model evaluation is completed successfully.

histogram.name: SegmentationPlatform.AdaptiveToolbar.SegmentSelection.Computed
histogram.summary: Records the result of segment selection. Recorded whenever the segment selection is updated.

histogram.name: SegmentationPlatform.AdaptiveToolbar.SegmentSelection.Startup
histogram.summary: Records the selected segment to be shown for the adaptive toolbar button. Recorded on chrome startup.

histogram.name: SegmentationPlatform.AdaptiveToolbar.SegmentSwitched
histogram.summary: Records the segment selection switch from an old value to a new segment after a model evaluation completes. Recorded only if the selected segment switches to a new value.
